about_the_game:
Game Concept

During a protracted holy war, a young knight, barely tested in battle, receives an unexpected call to duty. An ancient deity, revered for centuries entrusts the knight with the weighty task of bringing peace to a land torn apart by sectarian strife.

Battle System

Players must know how to use their weapons or spells well, whether it's a far-away battle or a close one. This way, they can become one with their weapon and be unbeatable. If the battle is too hard, don't be proud and use traps or poison to win. The most important thing on this long trip is to stay alive.

Combat mechanics don't just involve straightforward HP reduction. Players can also use shields to counter enemy attacks and achieve a decisive blow. The game also features stealth elements, allowing players to quickly take out enemies without being detected.

Boss Design

In the world of 'Long Trip,' players will encounter various corrupted enemies in the land of the living, as well as ancient deities who rule over each domain. Players may face human-like Bosses with rich and diverse abilities, or massive and majestic Titans.

Mount System

Your mount will be your most important partner in exploring the world, taking you to places inaccessible on foot, such as mountains and skies, and helping you in boss battle.

· Tame horses for quick movement and charging attacks 🏇.

· Tame wolves for independent combat and fast movement 🐺.

· Raise a dragon to conquer the skies and defeat aerial enemies 🐲.

Discover more mysterious creatures awaiting your exploration...

Party System

Summon NPC warriors to fight alongside you in epic battles. Especially important in large-scale battles, they become your sharpest force.

Collection & Exploration

Collecting and exploring directly affects your outcome in each battle, and every map has many valuable treasures left behind, including weapons, magic, materials, and consumables. Using these resources wisely can make seemingly impossible battles much easier.

Forging System

When Ark arrives at each new map, players need to prepare for battle, such as repairing damaged weapons that have been used before or creating corresponding combat equipment in the forging room ( such as a sufficient number of bows and arrows need to be prepared to deal with enemies flying in the air or enemies with long-range attacks).

Cooking System

Each campsite has a fire where you can cook collected ingredients into high-energy dishes with special effects. Some dishes fill your stomach, while others grant additional magical abilities to help you in your adventure (such as finding magic potion recipes).

Embark on a thrilling adventure across a mystical world filled with wonders and danger. Long Trip offers an unparalleled VR experience, combining breathtaking visuals, heart-pumping combat, and immersive gameplay.

Game Features:

· Thrilling Combat: Engage in fast-paced, action-packed battles using a variety of formidable weapons.

· Mounted Slashing Charge: Experience the rush of mounted combat in VR, delivering a truly on-the-spot experience.

· Boss Design: Encounter a diverse array of bosses, each with distinct abilities and tactics, culminating in epic showdowns against titanic foes.

· VR Interaction: Enjoy seamless and intuitive VR controls, ensuring a smooth and comfortable experience whether you're fighting or riding.

· Grand Scene: Explore a vast and sprawling world, filled with breathtaking vistas and grandiose war scenarios.

· Mount System: Develop a deep bond with your loyal mounts, training and customizing them to fit your needs.

· Forging System: Craft and upgrade your weapons, tailoring them to match your playstyle and preferences.

· Cooking System: Prepare a wide variety of mouthwatering dishes and magical potions, providing sustenance and strength for your journey.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: Long Trip is an action role-playing VR game set in a fantasy world where you can ride mounts, recruit warriors, tame pets, hunt, gather, cook, craft weapons, obtain magic abilities, and even summon ancient mechs or dragons to aid you in battles against bosses.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
